about_content1: Bonkeglobal Stainless Steel High-end Full-house Customization adopts advanced German technology and production lines that cover all areas of furniture for the entire house: kitchens, wardrobes, TV cabinets, walk-in closets, bathroom cabinets, balcony cabinets, laundry rooms, and balcony cabinets, among others. It also includes steel-aluminum combined wall systems and stainless steel decorative engineering. This greatly enhances the design freedom of the products and continuously improves the user experience, integrating the ultimate craftsmanship perfectly into daily life. Innovation and exploration are the only ways to achieve beauty and accumulation.
about_content2: Bonkeglobal's products are widely used in most large-scale projects such as China Hotel, Poly Park Hyatt, Shenzhen Overseas Chinese Town, Dongguan Dexin Industrial, etc., and have won high-tech enterprises, Chinese high-tech products, and Chinese design: designers' favorite brands. It has more than 30 certifications and more than 20 practical invention patents authorized by many Chinese and international departments. It has independent research and development product design capabilities, as well as professional technology and equipment. Introducing advanced foreign production equipment to open multiple stainless steel customized product production lines.
